name: Santa Gone Rogue
description:
Controls

Movement - WASD/Arrow Keys/Gamepad

Attack - V/Gamepad A Button

Cancel - B/Gamepad B Button

Ho-ho-how to Play

Guide Casowly, Santa's little helper, around the dungeon and collect all the creatures to be given as presents to the King; but beware the Skeletons, they want to keep the creatures for themselves!
